name: Devil Tactics: Brothers
description:
Devil Tactics: Brothers is a Tactical RPG game set in a fantasy world. 

###This version is a vertical slice of the final game.###

History The kingdom of Arres is being threatened by an army of noreen, dangerous monsters that spread deadly poison on its way. Nothing could stop them, not even the greatest army in the world. But the queen Faina has a desperate plan. Demons have a pact with her family and she is going to reclaim it. Features
  • Tribute to old school TRPG.
  • Dark story on a grey fantasy world.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Increase your power by consuming the soul of your enemies.
  • Discover the queen's dark secret.
  • Plan your strategy to victory.
  • Charismatic characters full of life.
  • Every level is a new challenge.
Input

For now just mouse input.
